categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: D4-R4B, nicknamed "Arforb," was an R4 astromech droid in service to the Alliance to Restore the Republic leading up to the Galactic Civil War. It was affected with a programming glitch, making it afraid of flying, and was consequently assigned to the droid labor pool at the Alliance's Base One on Yavin 4.
